panels

Class BooleanModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • listener.DefaultListenable<java.lang.Boolean>
      • panels.BooleanModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Listenable<java.lang.Boolean>

    public class BooleanModel
extends DefaultListenable<java.lang.Boolean>
    Stores a listen-able boolean value. Listeners always hear the current value, not the lock setting.
